script.line: COMING SOON: THE WORLD'S MOST COLORFUL BALL OF YARN
I'm feeling...pretty great about it! How about you?
The proof is in the pupping!
Let's see if it draws Minty to us!

then.line: 30 Minutes Later...
I don't think this is working.
Yeah. People don't really seem to be paying attention...
Well, I'm sorry Croco. I didn't mean to make you a bad window.
I guess I kinda messed up.
Aw, Prota...
There's still plenty of great balls inside!
I know... I just feel like I can't do anything right today.
Hey. We all have bad days.
You're doing your best. That's all I needed.
I know. I just kinda feel like trash.
Trash!
Yeah. It's not the best.
No! Prota, that's it! Trash! The landfill!
Look, I've never owned a dog before, but from what I've heard, they love getting into trash.
Minty has knocked over a few cans in her day...
Exactly! Why would she look at some dumb window she can't even eat from...
When she could have a whole mountain of delicious trash at the landfill?
That's...that's not a bad question.
Plus, Randi's always working at the Vintage Viper! If Minty's there, Randi would see her for sure!
Huh! You might just be right! I think I'll head over there and check it out. Will you be okay here?
I'll be just fine. Thanks for visiting! I'll see you tonight?
You better Ball-ieve it!
You're the best! I'll see you then!
So long, B.O.Y. Boy!
15 Minutes Later...
Huh. I guess it didn't work.
I mean, plenty of folks are checking it out.
But yeah. No Minty.
What do you think we did wrong?
Hmmm...Maybe it was the food ball.
Why do you say that?
I just mean... maybe Minty's not interested in window shopping.
She loves eating. So if she's hungry, why would she taunt herself with food behind glass?
Okay, interesting angle. Walk me through it.
I don't know. Who wants balls if you can't play with them? Who wants food you can't eat?
True, true... But then what do you do next? If you can't lure Minty with a window?
I don't know. I guess I'm really in a pickle.
Ha! That's a great idea! I'd never have thought of it myself!
...What?
Wait, you didn't mean...
The Pickle Yard!
If Minty's hungry, where better than the only place in town with unlimited mozzarella sticks?
Interesting...Interesting.
She does love a mozzarella stick.
Who doesn't? I could eat those things ball day, every day!
Croco, I loved that!
Haha, thanks.
I think I'm gonna head over there and see what I can see. You're okay here?
Oh, I am. With the crowd that's gonna be here tonight, I could use a little rest for the moment.
Perfect! I'll see you tonight, friend! It's been great!
You're the best! I'll see you then!
So long, B.O.Y. Boy!
Hmmm... it doesn't seem to be working.
Wait! Prota! Look!
What?
Across the street! Isn't that--
MINTY!! Minty stay right there! I'm coming over!
Go go go go go go go!!
I'm coming, Minty!!
Prota dashes across the street!
When suddenly...
PROTA!!
Aaaaaaaah! Mayoress!
Prota! What the heck!
Sorry, I can't talk, I've gotta go and get--
Oh, I'm sorry, but you're not going anywhere.
But--
Prota, I just watched you jay walk. You didn't even look at the light!
What? Oh no, I didn't even notice!
Here I am on a mayoral visit to the World's Most Colourful Ball of Yarn and Ball Museum...
Checking in on my constituents on the day of the Festi-Ball...
And all I find is sweet young Prota, ball-ing out of control and breaking the law!
I really have to go and--
No, no and no. There is only one place YOU'RE going now, Prota...
No...
Oh yes. You know what happens to folks who break the law in this town...
No, not there. Anywhere but there...
It's time to take you on a trip...
No!
TO SECURITY CITY!
Noooooooo!
A fun place to learn, grow, and learn the rules of the road!
I hate this.
Come with me, Prota! Time to refresh your memory with some SAFETY FACTS!
#SafetyFact: Security City contains no fewer than three miniature electric cars, perfect for kids!
Augh.
Now just follow me!
Fine.
...Bye Prota! Thanks for all your help!
